name: Shifter (OKNO Games)
description:
Created for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1! 
(Created in 4 days because we #4!°% up at first)

Shifter is a puzzle platformer where you shift through realities. Every person has two sides to them. One they let the world see and one they keep to themselves.

Solve puzzles in a place where you are never sure of what is real and where does it go after you no longer see it.

Shifter is a game with a minimalistic artstyle, combining puzzle-solving and platformer elements.

The Game features:

  • A 10-minute experience
  • 5 Levels to play through (+ Tutorial)
  • A great gameplay mechanic that the entire game wraps around
